Text:
640x272 does NOT equal 1080p or BluRay... 
Xvid is also NOT .x264
This is at best  DVD quality with acceptable A/V for that, but if it's BR then I give it 4/10...

@Tuckle Pretty sure all BRRIP means is it was ripped from a blu-ray, not that it's blu-ray quality ya dunce. You can only squeeze so much quality into 700mb, regardless of the source. If you're gonna bitch you should at least try not to sound like a complete fuckin idiot.
